description: Business licenses and building permits are required to operate a business in Chicago or to ensure that a building construction project conforms to the minimum standards of the Chicago Building Code. Currently the performance target for processing most business license types is approximately 15 days.

name: Performance Metrics - Business Affairs & Consumer Protection - Business Licenses
